ch.leica.sdk.Devices

Class Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.leica.sdk.Devices.Device
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ch.leica.sdk.connection.BaseConnectionManager.BleReceivedDataListener, ch.leica.sdk.connection.BaseConnectionManager.ConnectionListener, ch.leica.sdk.connection.BaseConnectionManager.WifiReceivedDataListener, ErrorListener, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ch.leica.sdk.Devices.BleDevice, DistoDevice

    public abstract class Device
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, ch.leica.sdk.connection.BaseConnectionManager.WifiReceivedDataListener, ch.leica.sdk.connection.BaseConnectionManager.BleReceivedDataListener, ch.leica.sdk.connection.BaseConnectionManager.ConnectionListener, ErrorListener
    Handles supported devices
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • connect

        public abstract void connect()
        Connect to the device. The result of the connection attempt
        will result in the ConnectionListener's onConnectionStateChanged() method.

      • getAvailableCommands

        public abstract java.lang.String[] getAvailableCommands()
        Get commands that are possible with this device.
        Returns:
        a string array of commands that are possible with this device.

      • getModelValue

        public abstract boolean getModelValue()
        This is a specific call only in bluetooth mode.
        This sends a command to the device to retrieve the model name.
        The model name will result asynchronous.
        Returns:
        true if model can be retrieved, false if not.

      • connectLiveChannel

        public void connectLiveChannel(Device.LiveImageSpeed liveImageSpeed)
                        throws DeviceException
        Open the live image channel. IMPORTANT: live images will be returned in a background thread, NOT UI THREAD.
        Parameters:
        liveImageSpeed - sets the speed of the live image channel
        Throws:
        DeviceException - Method not implemented for this device

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnects from device. After disconnection, this instance cannot be used connecting to the device again by itself.

      • pauseBTConnection

        public void pauseBTConnection(Device.BTConnectionCallback callback)
                       throws DeviceException
        For bluetooth only. This unregisters for notifications coming from the device. This results in not receiving any data from the device any more.
        Throws:
        DeviceException - Method not implemented for this device

      • processCommand

        public Response processCommand(ch.leica.sdk.commands.Command command,
                               long timeoutTime)
                        throws DeviceException
        All the processCommand functions are routed here
        Parameters:
        command - the command that should be sent. See further documentation to look up how to get the string value.
        timeoutTime - set a specific response timeout time for this command
        Returns:
        Response according to the sent command
        Throws:
        DeviceException - Not able to send the command or retrieve the answer, an error ocurred

      • sendCommand

        public abstract Response sendCommand(java.lang.String command,
                                     long timeoutTime)
                              throws DeviceException

        timeoutTime - command timeout
        Returns:

        Throws:

      • sendCommand

        public Response sendCommand(Types.Commands command,
                            long timeoutTime)
                     throws DeviceException
        Send a distocom command with Timeout Usage: YetiDevice
        Parameters:
        command - the command that should be sent. See further documentation to look up how to get the string value.
        timeoutTime - set a specific response timeout time for this command
        Returns:
        Response Object according to the command

        DeviceException - thrown if the device do not support YETI protocol

      • sendCommand

        public Response sendCommand(Types.Commands command,
                            long timeoutTime,
                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> parameters)
                     throws DeviceException
        Send a distocom command with Timeout + parameters Usage: YetiDevice
        Parameters:
        command - the command that should be sent. See further documentation to look up how to get the string value.
        timeoutTime - set a specific response timeout time for this command
        parameters - the parameters that should be sent to the device for this command
        Returns:
        Response Object according to the command
        Throws:
        DeviceException - thrown if the device do not support YETI protocol

      • sendCustomCommand

        public Response sendCustomCommand(java.lang.String command)
                           throws DeviceException
        Send any string as command to device. Data will be returned as ResponsePlain. Usage: Ble, Wifi, RNDIS
        Parameters:
        command - a custom string
        Returns:
        response
        Throws:
        DeviceException - if command is null

      • sendCustomCommand

        public Response sendCustomCommand(java.lang.String command,
                                  long timeoutTime)
                           throws DeviceException
        Send a disto com command. Valid for Yeti devices.
        Parameters:
        command - the command that should be sent as a string. See further documentation to look up which string is a valid command.
        timeoutTime - How much should the app wait for the device to return the response
        Returns:
        the response object
        Throws:
        DeviceException - thrown if the device do not support YETI protocol

        connectionListener - the object which gets called when the connection state changes.

        Parameters:
